paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Bullies tend to target the weak and vulnerable
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For Edelman to use his advantage as a lawyer to berate the Duan family who have come from nothing as immigrants and are trying their best to make a living running a restaurant is, in a word, unconscionable
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Clinical psychiatrists might find him to be an interesting case study in how living in the Harvard bubble can distort even the most agile of minds
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Sometimes intellectuals take themselves too seriously
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Sequestered from the experiences of the average man, they can lack common sense, kindness and decency
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Edelman seems bereft of them all
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There is a reason why places like Harvard are called"ivory towers"

paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: intellectuals are disconnected from the practical concerns of everyday life

paragraphs.text: So, it should be no surprise when guys like Ben Edelman explode like a bomb on some poor immigrant family trying to make a buck with the sweat of their brow

paragraphs.text: Fortunately, academic elitism is not contagious
